full_summary:
**Data Analytics and Enterprise Architect Services**
==============================================

**Title Description (English)**: Data Analytics and Enterprise Architect Services

**Title Description (French)**: Services d'analyse des données et d'architecture d'entreprise

**Solicitation Number**: 20221826

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01027940

**Publication Date**: 2023-02-27

**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-27T14:00:00 (exceeded)

**Expected Contract Start/End Dates**: None

**Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria**: None specified

**Trade Agreements**: WTO-AGP, NAFTA, AIT, Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement, others

**Regions of Opportunity/Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)

**Contracting Entity Name**: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI)

**Contact Information**:
- **France Emond**: contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca, 613-990-8294

**Tender Description (English)**: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for the provision of IT professional services in support of Risk and Data Analytics division's initiatives. The required services include data analytics, data engineering, and data science/advanced analytics. The contract duration will be from the contract date to March 31, 2024, with an option to extend for up to four additional years.

**Tender Description (French)**: Le Bureau du surintendant des institutions financières (BSIF) est à la recherche de services professionnels en informatique centrés sur les tâches (SPICT) pour la fourniture de services professionnels en TI afin de soutenir diverses initiatives de la division RDA. Les services requis incluent l'analyse des données, l'ingénierie des données et la science des données/analyse avancée. La durée du contrat sera de la date du contrat à mars 2024, avec l'option de prolonger pour une période supplémentaire de quatre années.

Please review the technical details and selection criteria in the complete [Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/elections). Bidders are advised that this process has occurred after the tender closing date.
